casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Timothy Glen MILLS No. 526A13-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 30, 2018 Ms. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Ms. Mary E. McNeill, Raeford, Attorney at Law, for Mills, Timothy Glen Mr. Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of May 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of May 2018."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 30th of May 2018 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of May 2018."
